titleStmt.title: Prologue to A commonwealth of women spoke by Mr. Haynes, habited like a Whig, captain of the scyth-men in the west, a scythe in his hand.
titleStmt.author: D'Urfey, Thomas, 1653-1723.
D'Urfey, Thomas, 1653-1723. Commonwealth of women.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for R. Bentley and are to be sold by R. Baldwin,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Thomas D'Urfey--NUC pre-1956 imprints.
